SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Heck, the door connects to a train platform? 
This world sure nails that sense of setting
off on a journey, that's for sure. Also, this station's gotta be even
bigger than the one in Miyako City.

SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Hey there, fella.
What's the name of this station?

SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Train_Conductor
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Why, whatever could it be but
the majestic Avalon Station! Did you miss your transfer, my good man? If so,
we'll get you sorted in a jiffy, for Avalon Station
is the terminus and starting point for every
rail line, and one can get anywhere from here!

SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Uh, right. Guess I was just a little bowled
over by how grand everything is.
Thanks for the help, guy.

SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
So this place is called Avalon, eh?
Wonder where I should go first.

SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Train_Conductor
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
Welcome to Avalon Station,
my fine fellow!

SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.text:
Avalon, huh? Well, I don't sense any spirits
around here, so I guess I just gotta let
the Wave guide me to 'em.

SUB_W09_SCAN_MIDO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_SCAN_MIDO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, cripes. Got this whole city to explore,
and my destination is just a few steps away?
I was hoping to see more of this place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.text:
With all these folks out and about, I'm not
sure where to start—heck, I don't even know
who I'm looking for.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.text:
Guess you're the lady I'm supposed to meet then?
Unless you're just some nice gal who hangs around
the station helping lost travelers—which seems
pretty dang unlikely, if we're being honest.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.text:
Heavens, this new lostling is
certainly a bit of an odd duck... Yes, well, you are not entirely incorrect:
my name is Guinevere, and I have been tasked
by the Crown with fetching lostlings such as
yourself and providing them guidance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.text:
Well, I'm Tsunanori Mido, and I've
come to this place looking for spirits.
Know anything about that, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.text:
Whether these spirits you seek are here or not,
you've an obligation to the Crown to discharge.
Think of it as an entry tax, if you will—and I do
look forward to your prompt payment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.text:
Oh, but please be at ease! I understand you've
nothing on your person which might be of value
to the Crown, so we'd be simply chuffed to
offer you a different means of payment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_07.text:
Lady, nothing about that
sentence puts me at ease.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_08.text:
You may pay your entry tax
by gathering these:

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_09.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_09.text:
They are valuable rocks
known as 'diamonds.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_10.text:
You will go forth and gather items of value
on the streets of Avalon. Said items will
then be converted into diamonds by way of
a secret process known only to the Crown. But I shall spare you the details,
for we've wasted enough time
discussing it already.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_11.text:
Guessing I'll need these tickets
to get around the city, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_12.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_12.text:
I'm over the moon to see you understand
our customs already! Not all lostlings
are quite so quick on the uptake. Now please do use the tickets as you see fit,
for that will be the crux of making this
a most successful enterprise.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_13.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_13.text:
Got any advice for a fella
before he gets started?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_14.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_14.text:
Were I you, I might perhaps start at the
Canuds department store; I hear one can
acquire rather valuable items there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_15.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_110_CUT_000_15.text:
And I'll have to be smart about these
tickets if I wanna get there, yeah?
All right. Might as well get to it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_00.text:
Hey there! Looks like you're the
lady I was led here to find.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_01.text:
A grafting right off the cuff?
This lostling certainly is assertive! Yes, well, my name is Guinevere,
and I have been tasked by the Crown
with fetching lostlings such as
yourself and providing them guidance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, I'm Tsunanori Mido, and I've
come to this place looking for spirits.
Know anything about that, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_03.text:
Whether these spirits you seek are here or not,
you've an obligation to the Crown to discharge.
Specifically, I'll need you to gather these:

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_09.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_210_CUT_000_09.text:
Were I you, I might perhaps start at the
Canuds department store; I hear one can
acquire rather valuable items there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_01.text:
A moment, lad? I'm Detective Inspector Spear
from Avalon Yard—and if I may, you're as
dodgy a fellow as I've seen in all my years.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_02.text:
Rude, bud. I mean, heck, even cops
need to be nice to folks.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_03.text:
A bit cheeky, perhaps—but still the truth.
Otherwise, you and I wouldn't be having
this little chat right now. Luckily for us both, I'm in need of a
right dodgy lostling such as yourself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_04.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_04.text:
As it happens, I know a number of chaps who
used to be lostlings—scouted by the queen
herself back in the day, so they were. Point is, mate, I need your help—and you are
going to give it to me, because otherwise
I'll see you thrown in the nick.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_05.text:
Heck, guy. When you put it like that,
I don't really have a choice. Still, I'm not the sort of fella who just
does what he's told without a reason,
so how about you fill me in?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_06.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_06.text:
There's a clever lad. Now then, what I need is
for you to put that keen judgement and lostling
power to work locating certain bits and bobs
on the mean streets of Avalon. I know that might seem like a load of old
cobblers at the moment, but it'll all make
sense at the end of the day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_07.text:
And I use these tickets
to get around the city?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_08.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_08.text:
Bright as a button, this one.
Now get out there and get to work—
I expect grand things from you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_09.text:
Got any advice in terms
of where to go, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_10.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_10.text:
Oh, I've advice in spades, mate.
For starters, take a peek 'round
the World Theatre, then make
your way over to Avalon Yard.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_11.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_11.text:
Jack Street, right next to us, is chock-full
of hooligans and cutpurses. Wouldn't normally send a green lad like
you to that place, but I think you'll find a
piece there that's key to our investigation.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.text:
Oh, and then there's the Royal Plaza.
You'll mostlike find a minstrel there
performing for tourists, and I wager
he'll have a clue as well.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_13.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_13.text:
Figure a bloke like you should be
able to take care of himself all right,
so good luck out there. Oh, and mum's the word on this investigation,
so don't go discussing it with any Sid or Nancy who
wanders by. In fact, just don't go discussing it at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_14.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_14.text:
Well, this is something. Guess I'll just
roll the dice and hope everything
turns out okay in the end, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the station where I started!
Looks like this whole deal was set up so I'd
make it back as soon as I ran out of tickets.
Pretty clever, actually.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Made it back safely, did you lostling?
Well done! Now be a chap and show me
all the valuable items you've gathered
so I can turn them into diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Heavens, this is simply brilliant!
That was merely meant to be a training
course, yet you managed to gather more
than any lostling I've ever known!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this is smashing! If you can get these
sorts of results from the training course,
you'll have your tax sorted in no time—
and maybe even an audience with His Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.text: Well, better than a swift kick in the bum, I suppose. Still, this was just a training course, so as long as you show better results on the real thing, it should all be grand.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, that's gone all to pot—and you were
only on the training course! At this rate,
it's hard to imagine you'll ever discharge
your duty to the Crown. Were I you, I'd do it again—and take it
seriously this time, unless you fancy being
tossed into the royal dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.text:
Now then, if you feel you adequately
understand your duty, you may proceed
to the next course. Or if you still lack for
confidence, you can try this one again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_090.text:
Hey, so why didn't that ring get turned
into diamonds? Was it actually worthless?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_100.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_110_CUT_000_100.text:
This old gold ring here, you mean?
Yes, that is a bit of a mystery.
Must be something of a special case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_210_CUT_000_110.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_210_CUT_000_110.text:
Did you not bother visiting Canuds?
Or perhaps you simply failed to find
anything of value there? Either way,
I suggest you try again—and harder.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.text:
Well, got the spirit power I came for,
so maybe it's time to say goodbye.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.text: Yep. Get while the gettin's good.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.text: Eh, let's look around some more.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SELECT_000_CUT_.text:
Now where's that numpty lostling
gotten himself off to?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_00.text:
So what happens to those
diamonds now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_01.text:
They will be presented to the Crown
as your entry tax and used to fund
various aspects of the royal family. For while the Crown's finances are handled
by the government, these diamonds need not
be 'officially' accounted for.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_02.text:
Must be a big source of revenue
for these royal fellas.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_03.text:
Quite. Hence why it is my task to identify
the rare lostling who finds their way here
and send them to gather valuables that
might be converted into diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_04.text: You sure seem like a big deal, bud.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_06.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_06.text:
Right then! You'll be on a different course
next time, and may end up visiting more
dangerous places and encountering even
dodgier individuals—so do take care.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_07.text:
Eh, I'll pull through somehow.
Got any advice for this route?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_08.text:
Begin with Nobleman's Square. It's where
the nobility of Albion tend to congregate,
but commoners may visit without issue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_120_CUT_000_09.text:
Yep. Makes sense noble folks would
own a bunch of valuable stuff.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_00.text:
Hey, so what's the plan with that
gold ring from earlier, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_01.text:
I will have it appraised so I might see
if it is worth presenting to the king—
in truth, I suspect it may have even
greater value than the diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_02.text:
Ever run into this kind of thing before?
Random rings, I mean.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_03.text:
Never, my little lostling—and it
makes me suspect you might be a
terrifically special fellow indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_08.text:
Try Nobleman's Square. It's where Albion's
nobility tends to congregate, but commoners
may visit without issue. And of course, such nobles are known
to possess precious items.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_220_CUT_000_09.text:
Precious items, eh?
Sounds good to me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_000.text:
I think I'm finally starting to learn
my way around this place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Heavens, this is simply brilliant!
Have you been to Avalon before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this is just smashing!
Let's keep it up, shall we?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Better than a swift kick in the bum,
I suppose—though I encourage you
to try harder next time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, this has gone all to pot. At this rate,
you're mere moments from being tossed into
the royal dungeons—and I've not the faintest
what might happen to you after that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_060.text:
Your fate is yours to decide.
Do you wish to try again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_090.text:
So that necklace didn't get turned into
diamonds? Heck, maybe the thing
really is cursed...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_120_CUT_000_100.text:
This old gold necklace here, you mean?
Yes, it does appear to be something
of a special case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_220_CUT_000_110.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_220_CUT_000_110.text:
You didn't visit Nobleman's Square?
Or did you merely run into trouble
with the nobles, perhaps? *sigh* I fear I may have expected rather
too much from a mere lostling...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_00.text:
Not to be rude, bud, but none of the stuff
I found in the areas you recommended has
turned into diamonds. Think that's just
a coincidence, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_01.text:
Yes, that is rather a sticky wicket.
They're gold and rather old, but I haven't had
issues with such things not becoming diamonds
before, and I can't speak to why it might be. Perhaps His Highness might have some
insight into the matter. Or perchance...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.text:
Yes, well, the next course will be the last.
Do try to complete one last circuit before
your lostling power dissipates completely.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.text:
The next course will be the last.
Do try to complete one last circuit before
your validity as a lostling expires.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_05.text:
If lostlings were to generate too many
diamonds, their value would crater overnight.
This is why we require but a single lostling
at any given time, you see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_06.text:
So you made a bunch of rules to keep
the ol' economy humming along, eh?
Makes sense to me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_07.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_07.text:
Alas, if only all of us were so
vigilant about following them.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_08.text:
Now then, this route will be rather
different: it begins at the royal palace,
and will likewise conclude there once
you make a full circuit of the city.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_09.text:
Hoping there's more advice
on the way, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_130_CUT_000_10.text:
Do you truly require my advice? I wonder...
Regardless, I would think it worth your
while to pop by the Royal Museum of Albion. As a visitor to our land,
I'm certain you'll find it
quite the fascinating place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_00.text:
Y'know, I found old gold jewellery at Canuds
and Nobleman's Square, and neither one
of 'em got turned into diamonds. Just seems strange, seeing as you
recommended those places and called
me a 'terrifically special fellow.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_01.text:
Kinda makes a guy wonder if
you're up to something.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_02.text:
And that is precisely WHY you are so very
special, Tsunanori Mido! It seems I can
hide nothing from your clever mind.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_03.text:
Well, then! If explanations you want,
explanations you shall have. Some time ago, I committed a crime.
As recompense, I was ordered to find
lostlings and use them to collect diamonds,
which I then offer up to His Majesty. Having now performed this service for no
small amount of time, I feel I have
sufficiently atoned for my actions.
And yet...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_04.text:
And yet the king feels otherwise,
so you've decided to take matters
into your own hands. That the deal?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_05.text:
Ever one step ahead, aren't you? But yes,
it is as you say: I am gathering gold items
to which the king's power does not extend
so I might use them to barter my freedom. So yes, Tsunanori Mido.
I am indeed 'up to something.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_06.text:
How many of these gold dealies
do you need, anyway?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_07.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_07.text:
If I can acquire just one more,
I think that should prove sufficient.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_230_CUT_000_10.text:
Oh, I cannot imagine you require
any advice I might have to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, made it back to the royal palace.
Time to go meet the big cheese, yeah?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_010.text:
That will depend on how many diamonds you
have gathered. Let's have a gander and see if
His Majesty will be chuffed to bits or tossing
you into his gaol.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, it's better than a swift kick
in the bum, I suppose.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_050.text: Well, this has gone all to pot.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_060.text:
It appears you can safely expect
His Majesty's gratitude. Now let us
take these diamonds into the palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_070.text:
Let us take these diamonds into the palace.
As for what will happen next, we'll simply
have to see what mood His Majesty is in.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_080.text:
This scant quantity of diamonds buys
you nothing but a one-way ticket
to the royal dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_120.text:
I got that wand at the museum, so it's
weird it didn't turn into diamonds.
Think it might be a fake, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_130.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_130_CUT_000_130.text:
An old golden wand, is it?
Yes, that's exactly the sort of thing
which cannot be turned to diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_230_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_230_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is where we meet
the big cheese, yeah?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_230_CUT_000_140.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_230_CUT_000_140.text:
No wand, I see. This speaks volumes
about your intentions, Tsunanori Mido.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_230_CUT_000_150.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_230_CUT_000_150.text:
And cheers for bringing me the
third golden item I required.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome back, Lady Guinevere.
'Tis a pleasure to see you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_010.text:
The pleasure is all mine, good sir.
I've a lostling here who stands
ready to pay his entry tax.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Excellent work, lostling.
You may enter.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_030.text:
And if I may be so bold, Lady Guinevere,
I eagerly look forward to the day you
might return to the palace for good.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_040.text:
The heck did that guy mean by that?
Did you used to live in the royal palace?
Wait, does that mean you're a royal!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_000_050.text:
I am but a captive
and a criminal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_000.text:
This fine offering of diamonds
pleases me, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_010.text:
If you require a boon, merely name it
and I shall see it done.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, guy, I came here looking for spirits,
so I'd sure as shoot appreciate if you let me
poke around and take home what I find.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_030.text:
As you have made an offering worthy of
such a request, your boon is granted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Your efforts in this matter are
appreciated as well, Guinevere.
You may go now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_050.text:
A moment please, Your Majesty! I have guided a great many lostlings
and secured for you a stunning amount
of diamonds in the process. As such,
I believe I have earned your forgiveness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_060.text:
There can be no forgiveness for one who
betrays their own king! Nay, girl, your
atonement will consume a lifetime.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_070.text:
I do not ask to cease my atonement,
Your Highness. I ask only for freedom,
for that is all I have ever wanted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_080.text:
What is the meaning of this, Guinevere?
Would you seek to defy me once more?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_090.text:
While no subject of Albion can defy their king,
this lostling has shown me your power does not
extend to otherworldly articles such as these.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_100.text:
You would use these trinkets to
diminish His Majesty's power?
How clever...and how foolish!
Guards! Seize this traitor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_110.text:
Hoo boy. Not quite sure what
I should be doing here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_120.text:
We cannot apprehend Lady Guinevere!
We'll not turn our arms against
our rightful queen!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Fie, more traitors in our midst!
But so be it—if you will not follow my
command, you may join her in death!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_140.text: Holy moly, this is not going the way I thought it would.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_010_160.text: Nope. Got nothing to do with me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I love you, Guinevere my queen—which is
exactly why I cannot forgive your crime. But I am a merciful man, and so will permit
the freedom you desire in the form of exile.
Now begone from here and never return!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_020.text:
I leave Lady Guinevere
in your hands, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_030.text: Please take care of m'lady, ser!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_040.text:
Well, cripes. Got all sorts of people
telling me to look after you, but no
idea what I'm actually supposed to do.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_100_CUT_020_050.text:
Continue your mission, lostling—
and without delay.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, Lady Guinevere. I am surprised
you have chosen to visit us again. Yet would it not be best to accept His Majesty's
judgment that you will not be forgiven and
cannot escape his power, even with the aid
of your skilled lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Even the gatekeepers greet me as a
nuisance now—but that ends today.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_040.text:
Think things'll go better
this time, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_000_050.text: With your power, I'm certain of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_050.text:
I am going nowhere, Your Majesty!
Today is the day I win my freedom!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_060.text:
Must we go through with this farce again?
A subject of Albion may not defy their king!
What will it take for that to sink in?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_070.text:
Ah, but this time
I come prepared...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_080.text:
With this barrier, your royal powers
cannot touch me—indeed, none of you
foul cretins can hope to stop me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_100.text: Okay, this seems a bit much.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_010_120.text: Nope. Got nothing to do with me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_000.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_000.text:
You have betrayed me, lostling,
and I will not stand for it!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_010.text:
No way, lady. You're the one who dragged ME
into this whole dang deal, and I've had just
about enough of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_020.text:
Please tell me I didn't make
a mistake here, fella?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_030.text:
Death cannot hold Queen Guinevere for long,
lostling, so there is nothing to regret.
But you do have my gratitude for your actions.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_020_040.text:
Glad to hear it, guy. Also, I know it's better to
keep my nose out of other folks' lover's quarrels,
but wouldn't it be better for Albion if you two
were able to get along? Anyway, sorry if I overstepped.
I'll take off now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_000.text:
I love you, Guinevere my queen—which is
exactly why I cannot forgive your crime.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_010.text:
If you look to kill me, simply call
the headsman and be done with it.
Then this farce will finally be over,
which is all any of us want.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_020.text:
If anyone must be punished,
Your Majesty, let it be me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_030.text:
Lancelot? What are you doing here?
There's no point in your dying as well!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_040.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_040.text:
There can be no going back to our
younger days when we could so readily
forgive each other our trespasses. Nay, we'll not know such until the day our
god calls us home. But on that day, I look
forward to talking and laughing together
as once we did.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_050.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_050.text:
Now leave my sight, the both of you.
And you stand down as well, lostling—
and go with my gratitude for all that
you have done this day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_060.text: What are you two going to do now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_070.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_070.text:
I will return to hiding and protect the
kingdom from the shadows, as is my duty.
I ask only that you might take care of
the queen in my stead, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_090.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_090.text:
Would you even have me, lostling?
Especially after I fought you and was
then rendered powerless?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_200_CUT_030_100.text:
You're always welcome with me, bud.
Now let's get the heck outta here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_050.text:
You didn't get a reward there,
Guinevere. You okay with that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_060.text:
For today, I shall have to be.
But when the next lostling comes,
surely my wish will be granted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_070.text:
Kinda makes it sound like
I let you down there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_110_CUT_010_080.text:
Those are your words, lostling—not mine.
Regardless, it is now time for you to
pursue your own goals elsewhere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_210_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_210_CUT_010_080.text:
Well, to be perfectly frank...you did.
And because you did not heed my requests,
you are now free to do as you will.
Farewell, my failed lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Right then, let's take a look...
Blimey, this is a terrible haul! Well, we can't have a gormless blighter
like you wandering the streets of Avalon,
so it's off to the dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_000_030.text:
What the heck, guy!?
I worked hard to get this stuff!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm sorry there was nothing more I could do to
help you, lostling. Alas, I fear I haven't the
faintest idea what becomes of those banished
to the dungeons...but best of luck all the same.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_010_000.text:
So this is where the
Emerald Wave led me...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_120_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, who knew I'd find a spirit here
of all places? Heck, no wonder I wasn't
able to assemble enough diamonds—the
Wave keeps pushin' me toward this fella!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_000.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, look who's still in one piece!
Sure am chuffed to see it, mate; Avalon's
full of dangerous places and types, much
as it shames an old bobby like me to admit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_010.text:
Now then, let's see if your eye for things
has met our expectations. That's what'll
determine whether this investigation
advances or not.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_020.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_020.text:
Blimey, this is a proper haul!
Sure you're playing fair out there?
Oi, you know what? I don't care.
Results are all that matters.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Now this here's a right cracking job.
His Majesty will be buzzing about this,
and no mistake.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_040.text:
Eh, bog-standard, I suppose. But try giving it
some welly next time, lad—it'll make everything
run more smoothly down the road.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_050.text: Blimey, but this is a right dog's dinner! Maybe I wasn't clear the first time—just being a lostling is a crime, and the only way to stay out of the nick is to bring His Majesty diamonds. What you've got here just won't do at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_060.text:
Right then. If you feel confident,
we'll take the next step. But if you want
to try again, we'll run it back for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_090.text:
...Well, no diamonds here.
Maybe these triangle deals
just aren't that valuable?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_100.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_100.text:
It's not about value; these 'triangle deals'
are vital bits of evidence for our investigation.
Now then, thanks much for your cooperation,
and I hope you'll see fit to keep these coming.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_110.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_110.text:
It's not about value; this 'triangle deal'
is a vital bit of evidence for our investigation.
In fact, I've a suspicion there's another one
of them still out there somewhere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_120.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_310_CUT_000_120.text:
Didn't find all the triangular objects?
Or could you simply not be arsed to visit
the key sites of this investigation?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_00.text:
So I know these triangle deals are made
of some special material, but I don't see
how that connects to your investigation.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_01.text:
Sorry, mate; can't be sharing confidential
details with the likes of you. Just trust me
on this: triangles have the power to change
the fate of this world. ...Or am I just taking the piss
out of you here, mate?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_02.text:
Heck, fella. Just can the riddles
and give me a straight answer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_03.text:
Ha ha ha! Just make sure you
don't let any triangles slip
between your fingers, right?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_04.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! On to the next.
This time, we'll be starting
at Nobleman's Square.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_05.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_05.text:
Your goal is to reach Avalon Station—
and the key site in this part of the
investigation is the Broadcast Tower.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_06.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_06.text:
Also, you'll probably run into a pickpocket
or three around these parts. They should
have some useful information, so make sure
to have a proper chinwag with 'em.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_320_CUT_000_07.text: I'll do what I can, guy.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_020.text: Blimey, this is a proper haul!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_030.text: Now this here's a cracking job.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_050.text: Now this is a right dog's dinner!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_060.text:
Your fate is yours to decide.
Do you wish to try again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_090.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_320_CUT_000_090.text:
Looks like you found all the triangles,
which means I can wrap up my
investigation all nice and neat.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, I've gathered four triangles.
You said this will aid your
investigation somehow, yeah?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_01.text:
Don't be so hasty there—
still got places I need you
to visit on the next course.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_02.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_02.text:
This one runs from the station
to the royal palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, and stop off at the hospital
on the way. You should be able to
get to the graveyard from there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_04.text:
Can't wait to hear why you're
sending me to the boneyard.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_05.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_05.text:
Gravekeeper has some kind of information,
but that's all I know; bloke refused to
talk to a copper.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_06.text: Which is where I come in.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_07.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_000_07.text:
This one could go pear-shaped in a
hurry, so stay on your toes.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_010_00.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_010_00.text:
All right, mate, this is our final course.
I've got nothing what needs investigating,
so just kick back and enjoy everything
Avalon has to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_010_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_010_01.text:
Oh, but make sure you don't wind up
in the king's dungeon—still got that
little ace to worry about.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_010_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_330_CUT_010_03.text:
Well, heck. If this is the last one,
guess I'll just have fun with it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, mate? How'd it go? Goes without saying
I can't have you ending up in the dungeon,
so if you don't meet the king, your problems
are gonna become mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_060.text:
Cor, you really cracked on here, mate.
His Majesty should be proper satisfied,
so let's get these diamonds to the palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_070.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_070.text:
Eh, nothing for it but to take your diamonds
to the royal palace and hope His Majesty
is in a forgiving mood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_080.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_080.text:
You having a laugh here, mate?
'Cause His Majesty's gonna have
you strung up by your thumbs.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_120.text:
I solved the puzzle at the grave and found
this, but got no idea what to do with it.
Thing didn't turn into diamonds, so I was
thinking it had some other purpose, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_130.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_130.text:
Just hold on to that for now, mate;
looks better in your mitts than
it would in the grip of some lowly
detective inspector.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ENDING_330_CUT_000_140.text:
Can't help but feel I'm not getting the whole
story here, Inspector—but I suppose I'll just
go along with it for now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Out of the way, you daft mug! Got a
lostling here what's got an offering
of diamonds for His Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Not so fast there! Who are you and...
Cor blimey, look at those diamonds!
I've never seen so many before!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_020.text:
You really think that's enough
diamonds to let me grant you an
audience with His Majesty!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_030.text: What say you look into my eye?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_040.text: Oh my giddy aunt! Y-you... You're...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_000_050.text:
We know the way. Oh, and that's some
fine work, mate. Keep it up.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_040.text:
Please accept my offering as well,
Your Majesty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_060.text:
Before those dastards used those strange
triangles to seal it away, this sword
symbolised sovereignty over Albion.
It belongs at your side, Your Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_070.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_070.text:
By all that's holy... Lancelot!
It's you! You've returned to us!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_080.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_080.text:
I have borrowed the power of this lostling to
break the seal, and am now yours to command.
With this sword, I swear to slay all who might
seek to bring evil to your realm!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_090.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_090.text:
The only one bringing evil to this realm
is you, Lancelot! Or have you forgotten
that you committed the crime of treason
against your own king?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_100.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_100.text:
I am a criminal and do not deny it. But only
the king can pass judgment over me—and
your vile hold over him is first among the
evils that will fall to this blade!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_110.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_110.text:
No matter how much power that sword contains,
no citizen of Albion is able to defy the king.
You should know this more than most, Lancelot.
...Now give him an order, Your Majesty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_140.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_140.text:
You always were a fool, Lancelot!
Did you truly think to march in here
and slay me like some hero of old?
To beg the forgiveness of your king? Oh, but seeing a man on his knees is a most
unseemly thing—so let me put an end to your
days of pleading by killing you here and now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_150.text:
Not quite sure what exactly
I'm supposed to do here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_170.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_170.text: Nope. Got nothing to do with me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_180.text:
So whoever wields this blade rules Albion?
Well, heck, folks. I guess that means
I'm the new lord of this land.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_190.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_190.text:
Keep such thoughts to yourself if you value your
life, you feeble lostling! You may have gathered
power from throughout the Conjoined Worlds,
but this world is ours by right!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_200.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_010_200.text:
Well geez, thanks for that, lady. I had some
doubts about sticking my neck out to help
Lancelot here, but that little speech just
made me sure as shoot I'm on the right side!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_000.text:
Lancelot, my dear friend. I am gladdened to
see you again, and gladdened even more that
you freed me from that woman's cruel yoke.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_010.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_010.text:
And yet, I am a criminal still. Even if I
did it to safeguard her, the fact remains
I absconded with your queen and
pledged to her my eternal love. I have betrayed my king, and in
so doing proven myself unworthy
to stand at your side.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_020.text:
But if ever your life is in danger, I shall be
there—which is why it remains my fervent
hope we never again see each other.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_040.text:
So what's next for you, Lancelot?
Er, or Inspector Spear, I guess?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_050.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_300_CUT_020_050.text:
I must quit this place for a while;
the king's majesty would only be
diminished by the criminal Lancelot
running about unpunished. Perhaps a certain lostling might consider
letting me accompany him on a journey
through the Conjoined Worlds?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_040.text:
You didn't get a reward there, bud.
You good with that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_050.text:
That's the way it goes sometime, mate.
My investigation didn't pan out either.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_060.text:
Kinda makes it sound like
I let you down there, bud.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_070.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_310_CUT_010_070.text:
Oh, you did, mate.
You very much did. I'd thought you might suffice, but there's
nothing for it but for me to start over
and try again. Here's hoping you have
better luck with your own goals.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_320_CUT_000_020.text:
Right then, let's take a look...
Blimey, this is a terrible haul! Well, we can't have a gormless blighter
like you wandering the streets of Avalon,
so it's off to the dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_320_CUT_000_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_LAST_320_CUT_000_040.text:
You've been angling for a trip to the
dungeons this whole time, mate, and
now you get it. Hope it was worth it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
Gosh, that's quite the line.
I wonder what's going on?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
Cheers, love! I'm the songstress!
I'm so glad ye came to see me,
and I hope ye enjoy this wee
signed photoprint!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
New song's gonna be a fine one,
so keep yer ears open!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
Lady must be some kind of singer here.
Wonder what her music sounds like.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Hello there, love—I'm the songstress!
Cheers for supportin' me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fan_Utahime
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh my gosh, I am your BIGGEST fan!
Please take this! PLEASE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
A gift for me, is it?
Aye, I'll treasure it always.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: And gratitude to you as well, love!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh, um, I don't... I mean,
I'm your...second biggest fan?
Now go break a leg out there!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
To be honest, I've been in a wee strop today,
but gettin' so many gifts from my fans cheered
me up straightaway. Now please just sit back
and enjoy my new song!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
The sun comes up and morning calls.
Without ye, I cannae go on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Can ye make yer way back to me, O love?
Can ye make yer way back to me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
So I go to Giant Moch Forest and daren't
look back. Oh no, I daren't look back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: The sun rises away, above me so far.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: I must bear the dark as night falls.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
I'll be off now 'cause
vultures are screechin'.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
I howl in the black!
I'm fiercer than dawn!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Let this fool hop on and
we'll be off, Golden Baum!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: And I cross the darkness alone.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Aye, singin' that perks me right up.
Thanks so much for listenin'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
Gosh, look how long the lines are now.
Guess normal folks have all started to
catch on to how talented this lady is.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
I'm supporting you, bud.
Keep up the great work!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh, cheers! 'Tis fine to see ye again!
I've nothin' but this wee token for ye,
but I hope it shows how grateful I am.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
Thank ye all sooo much for comin'!
I'm afraid the signing's over now,
so apologies to anyone in the queue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
You made it all the way to the front
of the queue at the moment it ended?
Oh, now that's just TERRIBLE luck! You must be gutted, mate! You must be cheesed off!
If it were me, I'd be screamin' to the heavens,
you know? Hell, you must be the most cursed
bloke in the entire universe!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text: I don't know if it's that bad.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
You poor sod. Here—take this.
It's the least I can do.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a place to drink booze, eh?
Means there's nothing here for me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We've a fine variety of fizzy drinks if
you'd rather, sir. Please help yourself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oi! I 'eard a rumour what blokes could drink
for free at this 'ere pub—gimme a shot of
the good stuff and keep it comin', bird!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I believe you've entered the
wrong establishment, sir.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Think so, do ya? Well, you got bottles
and I got a thirst, so what bloody
difference does it make?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Unfortunately for you, sir,
we've a new bouncer on the job.
...Ahem. ...AHEM.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_000_060.text: Huh? Oh shoot, is that me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Seeing as I cleared that guy out,
think I could get another pop?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.text:
A fizzy drink? Oh, posh. For that bold display,
I will craft you something from our
world-famous mocktail menu!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Hm. It appears I chose the wrong patron
to appoint as our bouncer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Now then, anyone who finds themselves
in the wrong place, please do leave.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Ah, our lucky customer! I've a wager
for you sir: win a game against me,
and I'll double your belongings.
But lose, and it all goes away. Also, as this is your destiny,
there is no getting out of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I take it this is part of the
special menu for lostlings?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, you're a clever one, aren't you?
Oh, I do so love a clever customer! Now, if the card is a heart, you win. 
But if it's a joker, the game is mine.
Shall we begin?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Seems luck is on your side today—
and in a way, the heart on this card
is my own as well. Now go on, love.
Take your winnings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Oh, now that's a right shame: you doubled
up, but actually have nothing to double.
Well, perhaps you'd take my heartfelt
feelings instead, love?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BAR_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Well, I see this fickle clown
is no friend of yours.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Museum of Albion, good sir.
To celebrate our bicentennial anniversary, we are
presenting commemorative gifts to our visitors.
I do hope you will accept one.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.text: Don't mind if I do, guy. Thanks.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Also, our newest exhibit, 'The Hidden
Treasures Beneath Avalon,' is scheduled
to open in but a few days.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Beneath the streets of Avalon lie not only
lost treasures, but unimaginably terrifying
creatures just waiting to awaken from their
eternal slumber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
But those, of course, will not be part
of the display. Regardless, please do
come back and see it. Pip pip!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I almost cannot believe this myself,
sir, but you are this museum's
one BILLIONTH visitor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Geez, what are the odds of that?
One in a billion, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm chuffed as chips I lived to see this day,
and must insist you accept this to mark this
most monumental of occasions.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Might I also recommend you visit our
permanent exhibit, 'Magic and Folklore'? It contains numerous archaeological specimens
from throughout the grand history of Albion,
many of which were said to have been preserved
through powerful magic!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_060.text:
It's quite the spectacle, if I do say so myself.
Indeed, upon seeing it, you might even begin to
suspect that I myself am a sorcerer of the most
arcane and powerful type!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_070.text:
But that, of course, would be folly,
so please set worry aside and enjoy
the exhibit at your leisure.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_040.text:
To you, our esteemed billionth visitor,
I'm pleased to extend a special invitation
to a behind-the-scenes tour of our newest
exhibit, 'Magic and Folklore'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Then allow me to present
you with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Ah, but I did have a reason for inviting
you into our back garden, so to speak:
this golden wand. I debated to the last whether or not
to place it on display, but fearing it
may have been included by mistake,
I chose to remove it from the exhibit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Not to be rude, guy, but I don't see
the big deal with your wand there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Alas, I'd hoped a lostling such as yourself
might sense something from the wand, but it
is clearly not to be. In that case, perhaps
I shall ask Lady Guinevere to examine it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Now hang on just a second there, fella.
You KNEW I was a lostling? So all this
business about being the billionth visitor—

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Speak not the remainder of that sentence,
good sir, for I feel certain neither of us wishes
to see the fine reputation of the Royal Museum
of Albion dragged through the gutter!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_130.text:
Now if you would be so kind,
take this with you as well.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi! Yer one'a them lostlings, ain'tcha? Well,
we'll be needin' your 'elp with an investigation,
lostling, so I'm gonna go ahead and nick one'a
them lovely little items ya gathered.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Turns out there's a criminal syndicate what's
using the connection 'tween lostlings and the
royal family to unjustly enrich 'emselves. So we'll be needin' to take a butcher's at this
'ere item of yours, see if it's connected to
said criminal syndicate. Now be a good lad
and 'and it over, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi, what's this, mate? You ain't got a damn
thing on ya! Well you're a right muppet of
a lostling, ain'tcha? Run along, ya skiver!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Greetings, sir, and welcome to Deeps. 
What can I help you with today? Footwear?
A bag? A fine hat? Or perhaps we could
tailor a new suit specially for you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Or perchance you seek something
else entirely, lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Yep. Figured this wasn't your normal
mom-and-pop shop. So whatcha got that
meets the needs of a lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
I trust this item will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, sir!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
We greatly look forward
to serving you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.text:
Have you come in search of another
item that might satisfy your needs?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.text:
This shop's gonna have some quality
valuables, believe you me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
I trust this item will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, sir!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_SPIRIT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_SPIRIT_0.text:
Shoot, bud, I could tell right away
this wasn't your usual mom-and-pop. So if a fella was looking for spirits,
you think you might be able to find
a few knocking around in the back?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_SPIRIT_0.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_SPIRIT_0.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and I trust
this spirit will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, sir!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_SPIRIT_0.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SHOPINGSTREET_SPIRIT_0.text: Do you still desire spirits, sir?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
In times of yore, 'twas the Knights of the
Round that bolstered the kingdom of Albion.
But in this day and age, that mantle has
fallen to we of the nobility.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Where I come from, fella,
we got rid of the aristocracy. So rather than waiting for a bunch
of fancy folks to support the country,
normal fellas like me do it—and the
country supports us in turn.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Bosh! Flimshaw! Why, I cannot even imagine
living in a place so uncivilised that it lacks
the elites capable of handling the great
burden my fellows and I bear. Rubbish, I say! Unadulterated codswallop!
Perhaps I shall educate you as to what
exactly this great burden consists of!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, good heavens, no!
My stars and garters!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Guess I oughta go
and save this fella.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_01.text:
Your assistance was hardly necessary, sir.
Nevertheless, it would be unbecoming of a
nobleman not to make a show of gratitude
for your efforts, so take this trinket.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_02.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_02.text:
Do you understand now the great
burden of the nobility?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
Come closer, my good man! Yes, there we are.
Now then, as you can see, I am a nobleman
of the great kingdom of Albion, while you
are but a hardscrabble lostling. Therefore, as befits the great burden of
the aristocracy, I am obligated to grant
you succour. However, if you prefer,
I can also proffer greater hardship.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
Not much of a choice there, guy.
I'll take the help.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
Yes, as suspected. But as
the choice is yours to make,
I shall honour your decision.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.text:
Sure felt like I was doing the heavy lifting
in that battle there, fella. Where's all the
aid you kept going on about?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.text:
On its way, my good man—for we in the
aristocracy are men of our word all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_02.text:
Ah geez. I lost. And I'm guessing
I know what that means...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
As a nobleman of the great kingdom
of Albion, I possess much in the way
of titles and territory. This necklace, however—a family heirloom we
have treasured for generations—means far more
to me than any lands or peerage. But tragically,
the item has a bit of an issue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
You think it's cursed
or something?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
I'll be hanged! I'd no idea meager
lostlings such as yourself were
capable of discerning such things! Well then, do you also possess the power to
dispel such curses? For that is the burden
which has been imposed upon my house!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
Eh, probably not. But if you want me to
take a swing at it, I sure don't mind.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
Then I beg of you to do exactly
that, my good man!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text: Think that did the curse in?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
I know not—which is why I have decided the best
way to free my family from the necklace's curse
is to part with it entirely. Take it and go,
my wretched lostling, for it is yours now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
What, so the curse is on me instead?
Yeah, not a fan of that idea. ...But on the other hand, eh, why not?
Heck, that duty's sorta the whole reason
I came here in the first place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
Duty you say? Gadzooks! Odds bodkins!
I'd no idea you were a fellow nobleman!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
Far as I know, I'm just some fella
who's lost his way.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.text:
I know not—and yet, it seems my house
has no choice but to carry on and bear
the necklace's curse for all time. I thank you for your cooperation
regardless, lostling, for I know
you gave your all to the effort.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.text:
Real sorry I couldn't do more
to help there, fella.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.text:
I am a nobleman of the great kingdom of Albion—
and you, sir, are a lostling of little renown.
As such, pray consider this my contribution
to the kingdom. Huzzah!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.text:
Thanks a lot there, bud.
That'll be a big help.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Looks like I can get some pretty nice
valuables at this department store.
Better take a look at what they've got.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh dear, just look at that slovenly man come
here to shop. Some sort of foreigner, perhaps?
Poor fellow must not be aware this shop deals
only in goods of quality.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Well, I poked around, and I've got my eye
on the rusty sword, the leather handbag,
and that old gold ring.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh my days, what sort of twisted sensibility
is this!? Aside from the leather handbag,
the rest of those items are pure rubbish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Shucks, which should I pick?
This is a toughie right here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Just look how happy he is to take that useless
old poker! Still, I suppose it's to the good that
our country has such foreigners to happily
tote away all these old bits and bobs.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
My giddy aunt! Did he overhear the
snarky comments I made to myself? Well, that's clearly my good deed for the day;
even a slovenly foreigner shouldn't spend his
hard-grubbed coin on rubbish, after all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Well, I'll be switched! Could it be
that dusty old ring is actually an
item of incredible value? No. No, that couldn't possibly be.
It simply couldn't! ...Could it!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Well, I poked around, and I've got my eye
on the musky cologne, the fresh-baked bread,
and that taxidermy bird.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Oh my days, what sort of twisted sensibility
is this!? A bunch of creepy old junk and some
bread? The poor man clearly has horrible taste—
and also must be rather peckish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Look how he delights in the smell of beasts.
What sort of life must this wretched chap live?
Oh, but I shudder to imagine it... Ugh, and now
I can't STOP imagining it! Oh, won't someone help me purge
this image from my mind!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
