SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: Well, Canuds does have an excellent bakery— and even if that beggared foreigner wasn't so clearly starving, I doubt he could have resisted the delicious aroma of their oven-fresh bread.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Well, that's money for old rope,
and no mistake. Fellow must really
love birds—I cannot imagine another
reason to make such a bizarre choice.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
Well, I poked around, and I've got my eye
on the stinky fish eggs, the old gold ring,
and those cookies.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
My days, what sort of twisted sensibility is
this? Oh, everyone loves a tin of biscuits to
be certain, but everything else is rubbish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
Why, that's madness! Why would Canuds
even deign to sell something with such
an indescribably foul stench!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
...A surprisingly reasonable choice for
a foreigner. Indeed, that's precisely
the sort of item a man of his ilk
should be purchasing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text:
Well, I poked around, and I've got my eye
on the leather handbag, a taxidermy bird,
and some muddy mushrooms.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text:
That sad little man must think those
mushrooms are somehow more natural
because they're caked with mud! What a simple creature to fall for
a crass sales ploy such as that.
Oh, but it breaks my heart.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
To sing, or not to sing,
that is the question.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
If you wanna sing something, guy,
just belt it out. Doesn't really seem
worth all the fuss to me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Hark, and who is this soothsayer that appears
before me? For while I know you not, I cannot
deny that your words ring most true. For you see, my muse has now urged me forward
in the belief that our next performance should
be one of song! Not that I will be doing the
singing, mind; we have performers for that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
And who was that muse but you,
O magnificent stranger! Now hasten to me, and quickly! We must finish
this song before the spark of creativity strikes
tinder and burns away—and it is your divine
duty to see this task through!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Er, sure.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you ready, my muse?
If so, step forward!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
The sun comes up and morning calls.
Without you, I cannot go on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Can you find your way back to me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Guess I better go to Giant Moch Forest
and never look back, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Fantastique! Truly, you are a messenger
of the muses—now pray continue!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
The sun rises away,
above me so far.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I must bear the dark
as night falls.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Better get on home, 'cause the
vultures are screeching.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah. Ahhh! Wonderful!
I stand at my zenith!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I howl in the black!
I'm fiercer than dawn!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
C'mon, Golden Baum. Let me hop
on and we'll blow this joint.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: And I cross the darkness alone.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! Ohhhh! Ohhhh...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: ...Seriously, guy?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I have completed a lyrical masterwork,
and my next show is bound to be
a great success on every level. You have discharged your divine duty
this day, my muse, and I am blessed
to have met you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. I fear I may have let my excitement get
the better of me. But in the cold light of day,
so to speak, perhaps I'll...skip the singing?
Mmm, yes. Definitely skipping the singing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Success demands ever greater success,
for the hunger of men knows no bounds.
Alas, but how am I to satisfy both
with my next song?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Shucks, fella. Worrying about how to follow up
a success seems like a great problem to have.
I'm sure lots of folks would love to be
in your shoes right about now, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
What you say could not be more wrong, stranger!
For to reignite the dim flames of creativity,
I am about to do no less than sell my very
soul to the devil!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
And from the way you abruptly appeared
out of nowhere, I can only conclude that
you are, in fact, the devil's servant. So inspire me, demon! And when my masterwork
is complete, you may lay my still-beating
heart at your master's cloven feet!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Uh... Sure.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
But soft! Can you hear it?
The beating of my heart?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
The dream of that night haunts me.
Haunts soul. Haunts heart. Haunts flesh.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Yep, the old soul's leapin' up
and down like a Maggot Ball.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, I would expect no less
from the devil's thrall!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
For you know the truth:
they hold dominion over all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
So I'll head toward that creepy
Gelatinous Matter over there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Behold that accursed sky! Behold the
accursed souls quivering in terror!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, why do the poisoned whispers of
a demon make my heart sing so!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
We return from whence we came,
come to greet the true king.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Joy as we cling to victory at the
battle's end! Emerge, O destiny!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
No shame in retreat. See the hope
within the sunflowers abloom in our
souls. We won't part from this world.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Heh. Ha ha. AAAH HA HA HA HA HA HA!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Well, cripes. Maybe the devil really has taken this fella's soul?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
If this be purgatory, I've nothing
to fear—for Virgil and Homer will
surely be here with me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
This isn't purgatory, bud.
It's the theater in Avalon.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, 'tis the devil's grim attendant—
and yet, I still feel my heart beat
safely within my chest!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, I have penned a masterpiece that could
stir even a demon's blackened soul, so I pray
you leave my heart intact until the performance
is ended. I will, of course, pay the necessary
interest to extend our contract.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
But for now, we must prepare for rehearsal!
There are props to make! Arclights to spark!
Scrims to fly in! Costumes to sew!
THEATRE TO CREATE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Heck, I'd pay good money just to
watch this fella go about his day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
My creation has failed. The devil has reneged on
his end of the bargain, and I am under no further
obligation to yield my heart. So take this to your
vile master instead, demon! Take it and go!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
As if I could merely sell my soul to
the devil for a masterpiece—this world
is not so tepid as all that! But when I think how close I came to losing
the favour of my muse... Well, never again!
I must endure suffering and again confront
the blank page head-on!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Gotta say, creating art seems
a lot harder than I thought...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Allo there, guv'nor! Welcome to Sorries,
Avalon's most out-RAGEOUS store!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Not sure what's so outrageous about it.
What do you even sell here, guy?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Never 'eard of Sorries, eh, guv'nor?
Well, not to worry, not to worry—just
stuff one of our famous eel pies in yer
own pie hole and you'll be sorted!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text: Why do customers gotta fight, bud?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Cause Sorries 'ere is famous for its
fresh-baked eel pie—and gettin' yerself
the freshest one sometimes takes a bit
of the ol' knuckledust, eh, guv'nor!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
But I don't think there's
even any eel in this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Sorry ya didn't get yerself an eel
pie, guv'nor. Do come again!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Allo there, guv'nor! Welcome to Sorries,
Avalon's most out-RAGEOUS store!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Right then, 'ere ya go!
One Surprise-ade, on the 'ouse!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text: Hey, thanks, fella. I was getting a bit parched there, actually. *gulp*

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
It's new, it's now, it's Surprise-ade!
What 'appens after ya drink it down?
Only one way to find out, guv'nor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text: Uh, I already drank it down.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
*COUGH* *HACK* *WHEEZE* Cripes, fella! Was that an explosion?
I think something broke!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Gosh, that's surprisingly fantastic.
What the heck is in it?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
It's a SURPRISE, guv'nor! But trust me,
yer better off not knowin'. Now 'ere—have another for the road!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Be welcome here, lostling. Take all the
time you like, or hurry on to your destiny—
for those who control their own means
of conveyance control time itself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Your transport tickets are no mere scraps of
paper—and this clock tower does so much more
than simply inform people of the time! Yes, time and movement—these are the
constituent elements of our universe.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
If one can control time and movement,
one's objectives can always be obtained! And with that, pray permit me to convert
your transport tickets into other tickets
of equal and equivalent value. Cheers!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Begging your pardon, but I don't
believe you have enough tickets.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Excellent.
Then these are for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_END_0.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_END_0.text:
Do come again! This clock tower
is always open for lostlings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Be welcome here, lostling. Take all the
time you like, or hurry on to your destiny—
for those who control their own means
of conveyance control time itself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Here I can convert your transport tickets into
other tickets of equal and equivalent value.
The only condition is that you are restricted
to but a single conversion per visit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
That said, you do not appear to possess
the tickets necessary for conversion.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Should you wish to continue this transaction,
you'll need courage enough to part with either
one of your valuables or a fragment of your life.
Would you care to do so?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Another city slumbers beneath the mean streets of Avalon—and I'm not speaking of the sewers! No, I speak of a place below the sewers, where the ruins of an ancient metropolis lie.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
And this here's the entrance
to this ancient metropolis?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Quite so, quite so. But just who built
that city, and what is its relationship
to present-day Avalon? Our investigation will illuminate
these truths and a good many more,
should such be of interest to you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Heck yeah, I love this stuff!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Eh, not really my deal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
A shame fellows these days don't
give a ripe fig for archaeology...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wonderful! I've been waiting for a bloke
like you to show. I'll just leave the
exploration of the ruins to you, then?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Can't say it feels very responsible to
let some amateur survey ancient ruins... Well, whatever.
Which way should I go?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I sense relics in this direction.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I sense fiends in this direction.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Okay, got myself a swell relic.
Better head back and report in.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Looks like I could keep going,
but which way?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Feels like it'd be real dangerous to go any
further, but all I've done so far is fight
a bunch of dang fiends! Haven't found a
single valuable at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Nope. Time to go back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: We're keepin' on!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, heck. Is this thing a relic?
Regardless, I better head back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Your help in surveying the ruins has been
greatly appreciated, and we would like
to present you with this small token
of our gratitude.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
I say, are you well!? Don't push yourself,
my good man; if someone were to die surveying
these ruins, we'd certainly lose our permit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, I see you've found a relic!
Please take this as your reward.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well now, this doesn't fit the historical
period of the underground metropolis at all.
Wherever did you come across this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Got it off some fiend
in the ruins, actually.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Fascinating! I wager the creature
must have brought it here from
some other place. Well, it's nothing to do with
our research, so you are welcome
to keep it if you like.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Another city slumbers beneath the mean streets of Avalon—and I'm not speaking of the sewers! No, I speak of a place below the sewers, where the ruins of an ancient metropolis lie. However, there is an issue...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Lemme guess: got fiends down there?
Or some weird cult, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: No, we've run out of funding.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Cash flow problems, eh? Sorry, guy,
but you're on your own there.
Best of luck, though.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, please! I'm not asking for a charitable
donation, sir, but merely an investment!
Even a small one would suffice—and I'll see
to it you receive an appropriate return.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
I'm guessing this is all for nothing
if you don't get the cash?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I'm certain we can get something
out of this endeavour. It's just that...
Well, there are two problems, actually. First, some sod came along and nicked what we
dug up, so we need to get that back. But more
urgently, our digging permit is quite limited,
and we can't afford to waste even a single day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sounds like you're really up crud creek.
But sure, fella. You got it. How can I help?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
A thousand thank-yous, my good man!
I'll see to it that you receive a fine
commendation from the Albion
Archaeological Society!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I don't need that.
Let's just get to excavating.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Of course, of course! Oh, and as you are
our generous benefactor in this endeavour,
you will determine how far down we go.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now then! This is the entrance to the ruins,
and there should still be many fine items
to find here. What say you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: This is good enough.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Nope. Let's go deeper.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
We have arrived at the centre of the ruins,
a location where we have found some truly
rare items in the recent past.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is the deepest portion of the ruins.
Even I have rarely ventured down so far,
for it is quite the perilous place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
What ho! A relic! Here, my good man—
this should prove an appropriate
return on your investment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Oh, I can't wait until my latest paper is published in Archaeology Today— and it's all thanks to you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Heavens, but this place is dangerous!
We'd best give up and head home.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
I think those fiends dropped this.
Let's grab it and get going, yeah?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Heavens, but that was a proper nightmare!
I don't think you're suited for investing,
sir—you take far too many risks.
So please just try to be satisfied with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Ho there, man! You're a tourist, yes?
If so, I invite you to enjoy one of my
many poems about the kingdom of Albion!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
The heck is a robot doing here?
Also, what are you even talking about?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'Ser Galahad and the Ice Sword.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Brave and bold Ser Galahad
His golden hair a'flutter
Did bravely reach the dragon's nest
That made all others shudder. He lopped the vile beast's head clean off
With the Ice Sword in his hand
And thus did the name of Galahad
Ring out throughout the land!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
I have just performed one of the
60,419 poems in my repertoire and
will gratefully accept my fee.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text: Then piss off and never come back!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
This sure is one fascinating gadget!
I wonder what poems it can recite.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'Ser Galahad and the Ice Sword.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
That sounds like it could be a fun one.
Let's give it a listen.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
The heck? All the scenery changed!
Does that machine fella have some
kind of VR capability, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text: Wait, I have to fight it now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
What the heck was that?
And where'd the robot fella go?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'An Ode to Ser Lancelot.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.text:
Ser Lancelot is Albion's pride
So brave and bold and true.
Whenever the kingdom is in peril
The stout knight does come through. But now, alas! A dragon comes!
Breathing flames of fire!
He must fell the beast to save his king
Or Albion shall expire!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Gettin' some serious déjà vu here.
I've seen all this before—
and heard it, too.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, kinda feels like I've
heard this one before.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Guess he's not gonna make me
do the fight again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Lancelot, lifting his spear arm high,
Slew the dragon with a swing
And leaving the fell beast on the ground
Ran on to save his king!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text: Glad he got saved this time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
If you are satisfied, I will now
gratefully accept my fee.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_000_.text:
Well, heck! I've been robbed!
They got everything!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text:
I'm making a citizen's arrest
for pickpocketing here, bud!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text: Get yer hands off me, ya nutter!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text:
Sure, okay—so long as you tell me
if you've got something like this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.text:
Look like you got a bit of rubbish
on your back there, mate. Yoink!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.text:
What the...? Aw, sweet heckin' cripes!
All my stuff is gone!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.text:
Tch! You need to work harder there,
ya skiver. Here, have this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.text:
Oh, cripes! I've been pickpocketed! ...Er, or not? Looks like my pockets
didn't have anything worth picking.
Well, that's a relief!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text: I'll take my stuff back now, bud.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
I know you've got my stuff, bud.
Also, I'm what folks here call
a lostling, and I'm guessing you
know exactly what that means.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
So you're a lostling. Well, la-di-da!
Still got no idea what yer on about,
and I can't give back what I ain't got.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, if that's how it's gonna be,
I'll just have to get rough!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
This new lostling of yours is a
right pain in the arse, Spear.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Caught in the act, eh, Sylvester?
Well, too bad for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
What we have here, mate, is a dodgy
pickpocket by the name of Sylvester. Deftest hands in all of Avalon, they say—
and I swear it's true, because I've not
once caught her in the act. But seems like you were able to make a
proper go of it! That's some fine work,
lad. Some fine work indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Bad look for the Avalon rozzers if they
need strangers to be doin' their jobs!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Keep wailing, Sylvester—we'll have
you singing like a bird for the rest
of your crimes soon enough.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
For now, the Yard will confiscate all your
belongings to use as evidence against you—
after which, you'll be expected to repay
your victims for every item you nicked.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text: Cripes, this is one scary town.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.text:
You sure act smug for such a shabby
lookin' foreigner, lostling!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.text:
But let's start over, mate.
Here's what you're owed from me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text:
All right, hand over what you stole—
or are you planning to play dumb
and run off again, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text:
I don't know if this is an act or you really
don't remember, but it's time to show
you the power of a dang lostling!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text: Bud, I am REAL tired of you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_010.text:
Bloody hell, mate! Looks like I pushed
ya too far and woke the beast.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_020.text: Yer a right nutter, you are.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text:
Got out of the clink, eh? You planning
to target me again, maybe, or is this
here all about revenge?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text:
So you're coming after me
even knowing I'm a lostling?
Now that's just not smart.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Don't go thinkin' you beat me,
lostling. 'Cause ya didn't!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
The heck happened, Inspector?
Why is Sylvester out again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Yes, I'm afraid that's one of the
more shameful aspects of Avalon—
or all of Albion itself, rather.
Afraid I can't say more than that. Still, you'll be compensated for your
losses, so you'll just have to try and
be satisfied with that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
I'm about as far from satisfied as a guy
can be, fella—but I also know better than
to keep runnin' my head into a dang wall. Gotta say, though, this really calls
your tough-cop act into question.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_020.text:
Oi! Looks like ol' Sylvester got
the better of you this time, numpty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Here at the royal market, we have everything
under the sun. Now all your shopping needs
can be handled at one convenient stop!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_010.text:
And for those who aren't looking to shop,
our famous Punch-Up Club is open as well—
and we're accepting all comers! If you've faith in your fists, come give us
your best; our trained fighters stand ready
to trade blows with all worthy adversaries!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I give you the pirate Silver,
Conqueror of the Seven Seas!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Time to throw my hat in the ring...
Hey! Got a lostling challenger here!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My, my! A bold young challenger has appeared!
Seems they call this one 'The Lostling.'
Just take a care you don't get lost
on your way to the ring, old chap!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Unbelievable! The Conqueror of the
Seven Seas has fallen to The Lostling!
Let's give them a proper hand for putting
up such a brave fight, lads. Oh, and you get a participation award
there, mate, so don't be disappointed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_010.text:
As for The Lostling, his day has just begun!
Now behold your next challenger:
the Warrior-hero Boudica!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, mate? What do you say?
Audience is frothing to see a
proper fight between you two.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Fine, then! Take your winner's award
and get the hell out of here! Oi, did you hear that, lads!? The little lostling
wants to find his mummy and go home!
Let him have it! I want boos to rain down
on him from now to St. Swithin's Day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_010_060.text:
And our winner is the pirate Silver, Conqueror
of the Seven Seas! Let's give The Lostling a big
hand for fighting so bravely, eh, lads? Oh, and you get a participation award
there, mate, so don't be disappointed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Blimey, I can't believe it! The Warrior-
hero Boudica has fallen to The Lostling! Let's give Boudica a proper hand for almost
turning that one around, eh, lads? Ah, but
life is cruel, so you'll only be walking
away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Right then, ladies and gents!
Who wants to see The Lostling
put up his mitts one more time?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Well then, consider yourselves a bunch of
lucky jammie dodgers, because the market
is about to hold a very special event! You're up for this, eh, Lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_050.text:
That's what I wanted to hear!
Now prepare to battle the champion
of the Royal Market Punch-Up Club...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_070.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_020_070.text:
And our winner is the Warrior-hero Boudica!
Let's give The Lostling a big hand for
putting up a right brave scrap, eh, lads? Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only
walk away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Blimey, but this one's strong as anything!
Truly a worthy champion, wouldn't you say, lads?
Now let's blow the roof off the building for
the newest champion of the Royal Market!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Come see us again sometimes, eh?
Having the champion around always gets
people excited for the Punch-Up Club!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_000_CUT_030_030.text:
The Lostling put up quite the fight there,
eh, lads? Let's all give him a big
hand for all his hard work! Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only walk
away with a participation award. Hope you
can avoid getting lost long enough to
find us for a rematch! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Market,
Avalon's premier shopping destination.
Please enjoy all we have to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I give you now Avalon's most
hated man...The Yob!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_000_040.text:
But a brave challenger has appeared,
one all of us know as...The Lostling!
Hopefully he can shop without losing
his way—or pay us even if he does! Ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_000.text:
It's over, lads! It's all over!
The hated Yob has been defeated
by The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops! Now let's all jeer the Yob, eh?
No participation award for you, Yobber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Right then, Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops!
You may have won a single morning match,
but another challenge awaits you:
Rodrigo the Veteran Hero!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, mate? What do you say?
Audience is frothing to see a
proper fight between you two.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Fine, then! Take your prize
and get the hell out of here! Oi, did you hear that, lads!? The Fellow Who Gets
Lost in Shops has lost his bloody nerve!
Let him have it! I want boos to rain down
on him from now to St. Swithin's Day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_010_060.text:
And our winner is the Yob! The blasted Yob!
Let's all boo the hell out of The Fellow Who
Gets Lost in Shops for dashing our hopes! Blimey, I'm so cheesed off, I don't even
want to give you a participation award!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Unbelievable! Rodrigo the Veteran Hero
has fallen to The Fellow Who Gets
Lost in Shops! Ah, but life is cruel, so Rodrigo only
walks away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Right then, ladies and gents! Who wants
to see The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops
put up his mitts one more time?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Well then, consider yourselves a bunch of
lucky jammie dodgers, because the market
is about to hold a very special event! You're up for this, eh,
Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_070.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_020_070.text:
And our winner is the Rodrigo the Veteran Hero!
Let's give The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops
a hand for putting up a right brave scrap. Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only
walk away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_030_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_030_000.text:
Blimey, but this one's strong as anything!
Truly a worthy champion, wouldn't you say, lads?
Now let's blow the roof off the building for
the newest champion of the Royal Market!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_030_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_010_CUT_030_030.text:
The Fellow Who Gets Lost in Shops put up quite
the fight there, eh, lads? Let's all give him
a big hand for all his hard work! Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only walk
away with a participation award. Hope you
can avoid getting lost long enough to
find us for a rematch! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now this may seem a touch abrupt...
but it's rematch time! You and me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_020_CUT_000_020.text: Oi! I've done it! You're brown bread, and I've reclaimed the title! Thanks for a proper fight... former champ! Bwa ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MARKET_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Blimey, he cuffed me around again!
I gotta get back to training...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This is a hospital, which means
only two types of people come here:
the sick and the injured.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As you clearly are not injured,
one can only assume you are sick.
We shall operate straightaway.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: Exactly what a sick person would say. Because of the brain lesions, you see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Look, I may not be the brightest fella,
but that doesn't mean I'm sick.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Do just lie back and keep calm, sir.
You'll barely feel a poke, and we'll
have you out of here lickity-split!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: H-hey now, just hold on a—

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aaand...done! Yes, it seems this
operation was a smashing success.
I'll prepare your discharge papers.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
The heck did they do to me?
My body feels...lighter?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh dear. It appears you're wounded.
We'll need to treat that at once.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
As you do not appear to be either,
we will gladly accept a small
donation of your blood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text: Now hold on just a minute!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Do just lie back and keep calm.
You'll barely feel a poke, and we'll
have you out of here lickity-split!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
We thank you for your
precious plasma.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Hey, so I'm looking to visit the
boneyard you've got out back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
The only ones with business in a cemetery
are corpses. We have a hospital right here
for the living, which you most clearly are.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Huh, so the way to get there is die?
That's real helpful, thanks.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
You're very welcome, sir.
Do take care.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
So this is the morgue, eh? Don't see any
bodies around, but I bet if I lie down and
play dead, somebody'll haul me on out
to the cemetery there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, I made it to the graveyard, but what
the heck am I supposed to be looking for?
Those triangle things are all I have
in the way of a clue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Hey there, guy. You seen a grave
connected to these triangles, maybe?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Grave_Digger
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the errand boy, eh?
Just look for this seal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Look for it? This place is huge!
Guess I better get started...

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So I just stick the pieces in like so?
Seems easy enough.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Yeah, this is a waste of time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Shoulda known I couldn't just
stroll on outta here with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Don't really get what this has to do
with Inspector Spear's investigation,
but I guess that's his problem.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Come all this way just to give us a donation,
didja? 'Cuz I can't imagine why else you'd 
come all the soddin' way out 'ere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, well, boys! Looks like we got
us a right philanthropist 'ere!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Got ourselves a right wazzock 'ere,
ain't we? Time to teach this git 'ow
things work in this country!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text: You're the wazzock here, guy. Whatever that means.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Come all this way just to give us a donation,
didja? 'Cuz I can't imagine why else you'd 
come all the soddin' way out 'ere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Oi, one ha'penny. One round ha'penny
to awaken me inner strength!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Did this triangle deal turn 'em into
werewolves? Cripes, I don't get
how this thing works at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Think we got metal spirits here,
but which one should I fight?

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MOVE_SQUARE_SIX_000_CU.speaker: HERO
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MOVE_SQUARE_SIX_000_CU.text:
Tram Ticket: The Deeps Boutique
Seek out spirit power.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MOVE_SQUARE_SIX_000_CU.speaker: HERO
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MOVE_SQUARE_SIX_000_CU.text:
Coach Ticket: The Deeps Boutique
Seek out spirit power.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.text:
Make for Avalon Yard.
Don't worry; this won't end
with you in a jail cell.

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_010.text:
Oi, how is it ya got nothin' on ya!?
Thanks for wastin' me time!

SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MOVE_SQUARE_SIX_000_CU.speaker: HERO
SUB_W09_EVAR_MIDO_MOVE_SQUARE_SIX_000_CU.text:
Motorcar Ticket: The Deeps Boutique
Seek out spirit power.
